content:
WebHttpEndpointElement Class

In this Article

Represents a WCF configuration element for a web service application.

Syntax

Declaration

public class WebHttpEndpointElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardEndpointElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ConfigurationElement
  • System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardEndpointElement
  • WebHttpEndpointElement

Constructors summary

WebHttpEndpointElement()

Creates a new instance of the WebHttpEndpointElement class.

Properties summary

AutomaticFormatSelectionEnabled

Gets or sets whether automatic formatting selection is turned on.
ContentTypeMapper

Gets or sets the type of MIME content of the data sent by a web service operations.
CrossDomainScriptAccessEnabled

Gets or sets whether a condition is enabled that allows code injection into web pages viewed by other users.
DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat

Gets or sets the default format for responses sent out from a web service operations.
EndpointType

Gets the type of the WebHttpEndpoint.
FaultExceptionEnabled

Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
HelpEnabled

Gets or sets whether help is enabled.
HostNameComparisonMode

Gets or sets the web service host name and URI matching rule that is configured in the binding element and used by transports such as HTTP, TCP, and named pipes when dispatching incoming messages.
MaxBufferPoolSize

Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints using this binding.
MaxBufferSize

Gets or sets the maximum buffer size to use.
MaxReceivedMessageSize

Gets or sets the maximum number of messages that can be received by the web service.
Properties

Gets the collection of ConfigurationProperty objects associated with the current WebHttpEndpointElement.
ReaderQuotas

Gets the XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement object that contains contraints on length and complexity of XML strings that are read by the XML dictionary reader.
Security

Gets an element that configures the security for a web service with endpoints that receive HTTP requests.
TransferMode

Gets or sets the WCF method of transporting data across a network between endpoints.
WriteEncoding

Gets or sets the string to be encoded.

Methods summary

CreateServiceEndpoint(ContractDescription)

Creates a new endpoint of type WebHttpEndpoint with the specified contract description.
OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ChannelEndpointElement)

Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebHttpEndpoint.
OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ServiceEndpointElement)

Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebHttpEndpoint.
OnInitializeAndValidate(ChannelEndpointElement)

Initializes and verifies the format of a specified channel endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.
OnInitializeAndValidate(ServiceEndpointElement)

Initializes and verifies the format of a specified service endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.

Constructors

  • WebHttpEndpointElement()

    Creates a new instance of the WebHttpEndpointElement class.

    public WebHttpEndpointElement ();

Properties

  • AutomaticFormatSelectionEnabled

    Gets or sets whether automatic formatting selection is turned on.

    public bool AutomaticFormatSelectionEnabled { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if automatic formatting is enabled; otherwise, false.

  • ContentTypeMapper

    Gets or sets the type of MIME content of the data sent by a web service operations.

    public string ContentTypeMapper { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the name of a MIME content.

  • CrossDomainScriptAccessEnabled

    Gets or sets whether a condition is enabled that allows code injection into web pages viewed by other users.

    public bool CrossDomainScriptAccessEnabled { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if access is enabled; otherwise, false.

  • DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat

    Gets or sets the default format for responses sent out from a web service operations.

    public System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • WebMessageFormat

      A format object.

  • EndpointType

    Gets the type of the WebHttpEndpoint.

    protected override Type EndpointType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      A type object.

  • FaultExceptionEnabled

    Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.

    public bool FaultExceptionEnabled { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns true if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns false.

  • HelpEnabled

    Gets or sets whether help is enabled.

    public bool HelpEnabled { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if help is enabled; otherwise, false.

  • HostNameComparisonMode

    Gets or sets the web service host name and URI matching rule that is configured in the binding element and used by transports such as HTTP, TCP, and named pipes when dispatching incoming messages.

    public System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • HostNameComparisonMode

      An enumerated comparison mode.

  • MaxBufferPoolSize

    Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints using this binding.

    public long MaxBufferPoolSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      A 64-bit representation of a number.

  • MaxBufferSize

    Gets or sets the maximum buffer size to use.

    public int MaxBufferSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      A number representing buffer size.

  • MaxReceivedMessageSize

    Gets or sets the maximum number of messages that can be received by the web service.

    public long MaxReceivedMessageSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      A 64-bit number representing a maximum quantity.

  • Properties

    Gets the collection of ConfigurationProperty objects associated with the current WebHttpEndpointElement.

    protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }

    Property Value

    • ConfigurationPropertyCollection

      A collection of configuration properties.

  • ReaderQuotas

    Gets the XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement object that contains contraints on length and complexity of XML strings that are read by the XML dictionary reader.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement ReaderQuotas { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement

      An object that contains XML dictionary reader quotas.

  • Security

    Gets an element that configures the security for a web service with endpoints that receive HTTP requests.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement Security { get; }

    Property Value

    • WebHttpSecurityElement

      A web service security element.

  • TransferMode

    Gets or sets the WCF method of transporting data across a network between endpoints.

    public System.ServiceModel.TransferMode TransferMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TransferMode

      An enumeration of transfer modes.

    Remarks

    The three main transport modes are HTTP, TCP, and named pipes.

  • WriteEncoding

    Gets or sets the string to be encoded.

    public System.Text.Encoding WriteEncoding { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Encoding

      Encoded text.

Methods

  • CreateServiceEndpoint(ContractDescription)

    Creates a new endpoint of type WebHttpEndpoint with the specified contract description.

    protected override System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint CreateServiceEndpoint (System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription contractDescription);

    Parameters

    • contractDescription
      ContractDescription

      An object of type ContractDescription that specifies what an endpoint communicates to the outside world, including the signature of the operations in terms of messages exchanged, the data types of these messages, the location of the operations, and the specific protocols and serialization formats that are used to support successful communication with the service.

    Returns

    • ServiceEndpoint

      A service endpoint.

  • OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ChannelEndpointElement)

    Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebHttpEndpoint.

    protected override void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • endpoint
      ServiceEndpoint

      The ServiceEndpoint to which web HTTP configuration settings are applied.

    • serviceEndpointElement
      ChannelEndpointElement

      Not implemented.

  • OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ServiceEndpointElement)

    Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebHttpEndpoint.

    protected override void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • endpoint
      ServiceEndpoint

      The ServiceEndpoint to which web HTTP configuration settings are applied.

    • serviceEndpointElement
      ServiceEndpointElement

      Not implemented.

  • OnInitializeAndValidate(ChannelEndpointElement)

    Initializes and verifies the format of a specified channel endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.

    protected override void OnInitializeAndValidate (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • channelEndpointElement
      ChannelEndpointElement

      The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.

  • OnInitializeAndValidate(ServiceEndpointElement)

    Initializes and verifies the format of a specified service endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.

    protected override void OnInitializeAndValidate (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • serviceEndpointElement
      ServiceEndpointElement

      The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.
